summary: Gamera the Flying Turtle falls under the spell of evil aliens, but two children free him and he returns to fight the aliens' monster, Viras.
cast: Kôjirô Hongô|Tôru Takatsuka|Carl Craig|Michiko Yaegaki|Mari Atsumi|Junko Yashiro|Peter Williams|Kôji Fujiyama|Yoshirô Kitahara|Munehiko Takada|Mary Morris|Chikara Hashimoto|Kenji Gô|Akira Natsuki|Ken Nakahara|Kenichiro Yamane|Genzô Wakayama|Kei'ichi Noda|Corinne Orr|Teruo Aragaki
director: Directors: Noriaki Yuasa (as Kenji Yuasa), Shigeo Tanaka (uncredited)
title: Viras ataca la Tierra
